description: A compact cook system to create a backcountry meal for 2. The Sigma Set 2.2 includes both a 1.2L and 2.7L stainless steel Sigma Pot with straining lids, plus 2 bowls, 2 insulated mugs, and even a dishcloth. It all nests together in your pack so you barely notice it on the trail.1.2L and 2.7L pot are rugged stainless steel with a large internal radius for easy cleaning.DeltaLight™ bowls and insulated mugs are glass-reinforced polypropylene (microwave- and dishwasher-safe).Strainer lids for easy draining.Pivoting handles lock in place for solid handling.Printed graduations on pots and mugs for measuring.Everything nests inside the large pot for transport.
name: Sea To Summit Sigma 2 Pot Cookset 2.2
